column1: #text=Planting a tree is a wonderful thing you can do for your community and your environment .
#text=They are also beautiful and we need them from , something to build a fort in , to wood to build our homes .
#text=Plant a tree by selecting the species you think would be best suited for the location and soil that you have .
#text=You then dig a hole that will keep the top of the rootball just slightly below ground level and the base of the tree just so it can have a shallow circle made around it .
#text=Fill in some fresh soil or even compost made from old rotting leaves and grass clippings .
#text=This will help fertilize the tree and if you want you can add some fertilizer .
#text=Cover it up and make a small ring around the base of the tree to help catch water .
#text=Then water the tree for a good long time so the roots will grow deep .
